did.abstract: Women's social and reading society. Minutes, programs, membership lists, and miscellaneous papers read before the club.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records came to the library from Mrs. Raymond Hyde (donor no. 4089).

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Bay View Club (Fenton, Mich.) minutes, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Bay View Club was originally called the Bay View Reading Circle of Fenton. The organization is a women's social and literary club.

scopecontent.p: The record group consists almost entirely of minutes of the meetings of the organization dating from 1897 to 1970. There are, in addition, a scattering of programs, membership lists, and papers read at club meetings.
